Package no.uib.triogen.io.genotypes.iterators.window

Class BufferedGenotypesIterator

java.lang.Object
no.uib.triogen.io.genotypes.iterators.window.BufferedGenotypesIterator
All Implemented Interfaces:
WindowGenotypesIterator
public class BufferedGenotypesIterator
extends Object
implements WindowGenotypesIterator
Buffered iterator for the genotypes of a file.
Author:
Marc Vaudel

  • Constructor Details

    • BufferedGenotypesIterator

      public BufferedGenotypesIterator​(VariantIterator iterator, ChildToParentMap childToParentMap, int upStreamDistance, int downStreamDistance, double mafThreshold, int nVariants, double downstreamLoadingFactor, double upstreamLoadingFactor)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      iterator - The variants iterator to use.
      childToParentMap - The map of trios.
      upStreamDistance - The distance in bp to load ahead of the current bp (inclusive).
      downStreamDistance - The distance in bp to keep after the current bp (inclusive).
      mafThreshold - The maf threshold. maf is computed in parents and values lower than threshold are not included (inclusive).
      nVariants - The number of variants to process in batch.
      downstreamLoadingFactor - The loading factor to use when trimming the buffer.
      upstreamLoadingFactor - The loading factor to use when buffering.

      Returns the next element. Null if iteration is finished.

      Description copied from interface: WindowGenotypesIterator
      Returns an iterator over the genotypes of the given contig in the given bp range.

      Parameters:
